resources.string: The Edinburgh Augmented Reality Tours application has a number of features available to the user in order to enhance a tourists experience in Edinburgh.
The explore feature will display every point of interest in Edinburgh. Use this feature to look around and find your favorite points on interest in Edinburgh.
The places feature will allow you to select a single point of interest. This will then allow you to navigate your way to this point of interest without being distracted with other points.
The tours feature will take you on a tour of Edinburgh. You will be able to explore a number of places and learn about some of Edinburgh's history.
The preferences feature allows you to select an interest. You will then be shown points of interest based on your preference.
Welcome to Edinburgh Augmented Reality Tours.
With this application, we look to use the power of Augmented Reality to enhance your experience when exploring Edinburgh.
So get started and dive into the great sights that Edinburgh has to Offer. Use the menu icon to select a feature and get going.
